title: Animal Skeletons
description: This book teaches about animals and their skeletons. Through detailed illustrations and repetitive phrases, readers learn about the types and functions of bones in humans and other animals.
meta: bones, different, hollow, light, skeleton, support
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Pronouns : Recognize and use pronouns they and it
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
